feeling;	don’t	suffer	alone	–

Worrying about the birth
It	is	difficult	to	imagine	what	a	
contraction is like and no one 
can	really	tell	you	–	though	
they may try! Exploring ways 
of coping with labour may help 
you to feel more in control.
You can begin by reading the 
chapter on Labour and birth 
(page 99) with your partner 
or a friend or rela
